post:
Hello Guys!

If you are looking for a VPS check us out over at https://sernethosting.com

We offer:
Daily Backups on all VPS servers and allow self managed restores!


SSD VPS Servers:
_These servers can be found at the below url. Pricing has been added to the thread for convenience_

https://sernethosting.com/ssd-vps.php

2GB SSD VPS
1GB Swap
1 Core
Intel Xeon E3-1245v2 CPU
25GB SSD Storage
Unlimited Bandwidth @ 200mb/ps

$5/mo First month just $4.50 using promo code **_LowEndTalk_**

HDD VPS Servers:
_These servers can be found at the below url. Pricing has been added to the thread for convenience_

https://sernethosting.com/hdd-vps.php

2GB HDD VPS
1GB Swap
1 Core
Intel Xeon E3-1245v2 CPU
100GB HDD Storage
Unlimited Bandwidth @ 200mb/ps

$5/mo First month just $4.50 using promo code **_LowEndTalk_**

The promo code **_LowEndTalk_** is also valid on cPanel VPS servers, Storage VPS servers and web hosting along with reseller web hosting,

All our reseller plans include a free WHMCS licence among with overselling allowed, a white labelled url, Jet Backups with reseller access to restore there own accounts and pure SSD hardware!
